alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Itasca and western St. Louis Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 215 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Keewatin, or 15 miles northwest of Hibbing, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hibbing around 230 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Chisholm. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Itasca; South Itasca
